title: Ep. 46 - Nick Kickflips our 100,000 Subscriber Plaque
description: Our YouTube plaque is finally used for what it was made for - for Nick to injure himself doing skate tricks in front of his friends. Also this week, Ludwig falls further into the dark hole of gambling addiction, Slime's suspicions of the Riot Games cabal are confirmed, and Aiden pees on The Yard set (again).
itunes:title: Nick Finally Kick Flips the YouTube Plaque
itunes:author: The Yard
